attributes.action: Goverment support for the British Games Industry
attributes.additional_details:
We need the government to support the British Games Industry in the form of incentives and tax breaks to companies that have studios located in the UK.

We have fallen behind our competitors, especially to countries like Canada that actively support the sector.

The sector is decline despite the fact we have some of the worlds greatest companies here.

With government help we should be acknowledging this great sector and recognise the revenue it brings to the country.
